alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 6:50AM MST until November 28 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Snow rates of 1 inch per hour at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. A brief break in show is expected Sunday afternoon before periods of moderate to heavy snow showers develop for Sunday night. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and Greer Grade. * WHEN...From 9 AM Sunday to 8 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
